messages.content:
Hi Raj,

Thanks for writing into us.

For more details kindly go through the entire T & C mentioned in the email.

We hope you have a great time watching the movie.

Thanks,
Team BOSS
And why 2 options for movie and theatre?
How many days before I have to book for a movie?
I have got the mail!but I have a doubt

Hi Raj,

Thank you for writing into us.

Please check your email inbox if not the spam folders. The email was sent to you at 7:20pm yesterday.

If you still haven't received it in your inbox, please get back to us . We will arrange it to be re-send to you.

Thanks,
Team BOSS
I have still not received the voucher yet
And which voucher will I get?

Hi Raj,

Thank you for sending all the details.

You can expect it by Monday 22nd May.

Thanks,
Team BOSS
When will I get my Voucher?
Any other detail do I have to send?

Hi Raj,

Thank you for sending in the details.

We will get back to you soon.

Thanks,
Team BOSS
What am I going to get?
Guyyz I have Won the #CelebratingMotherhood Contest.What all details do I have to Send?
